#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int t,n,r,i,j,c,nr,dr,no,sum;
    long long int a[1004];

    a[0]=0;
    a[1]=1;
    a[2]=1;
    a[3]=2;

    for(i=4;i<=1000;i++)
    {
        sum=0;
        for(j=1;2*j<i;j++)
        {
            sum+=2*a[j]*a[i-j];
        }
        if(sum>10000)
        sum%=10000;
        if(i%2==0)
        sum+=a[i/2]*a[i/2];

        a[i]=sum%10000;
        //cout<<a[i]<<" ";
    }

    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>no;

        cout<<a[no]<<endl;
    }
  return 0;
}
